title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first try. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view. This issue occurs consistently and prevents users from selecting the desired items.
OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the focus immediately jumps to the library file node.
EB: After adding a label to a library file, the user should be able to select the label item in the library outline view without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR: 1. Add a label to a library file. 2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view. 3. Verify that the item can be selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.
